nodes.bodyText: Can't see performance improvement changes as part of this PR

+## 2020-03-31, Version 0.10.1.2 (Current)
+
+- Fixed bug which caused user to lose roles on account password update
+- Performance improvement by implementing faster version of implies type perm

It will be going out with this release.
